roastr_persona.title: Roastr Persona

benefits.personalized: More personalized and authentic roasts according to your style
benefits.detection: Enhanced detection of specific attacks toward you

roastr_persona.privacy_note: üîí Privacy guaranteed: All data is encrypted with AES-256 and private by default. Only you can see and decide whether to make them public.

identity.label: What defines me
identity.placeholder: e.g.: I'm a developer, I like coffee, I hate unnecessary meetings...
identity.description: Describe who you are: your profession, hobbies, values, tastes. This helps Roastr generate more authentic responses and detect personalized attacks.

intolerance.label: What I don't tolerate
intolerance.placeholder: e.g.: Comments about my appearance, jokes about my family...
intolerance.description: Define topics or comments you don't tolerate. Roastr will be more aggressive defending these boundaries and may filter or automatically block this type of content.

tolerance.label: What I don't care about
tolerance.placeholder: e.g.: Jokes about my age, comments about my music taste...
tolerance.description: Indicate topics that don't affect you or you don't care about. Roastr will ignore these comments or respond with light humor, not taking them seriously.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: For policy compliance, you can choose how to identify that some responses are AI-generated. It's not mandatory, but a customization option.
